SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Calculated by Drawdown Team using bike usage estimates guided by data from Cherry, C., & Cervero, R. (2007). Use characteristics and mode choice behavior of electric bike users in China. Transport Policy, 14(3), 247-257. AND Fyhri, A., & Fearnley, N. (2015). Effects of e-bikes on bicycle use and mode share. Transportation Research Part D: Transport and Environment, 36, 45-52.
Assumptions: 10veh-km  traveled per workday and 5 per weekend day with an additional traveler 5% of time
